text: @PaulKagame @WHO @StateHouseKenya @Macky_Sall @MagufuliJP @Presidence_RDC @CyrilRamaphosa @BorisJohnson @KGeorgieva As much as handwash is the most ideal way to protect o/selves from coronavirus but do we have tap running water if not well designed containers for convenient handwash in many homes in cities, villages or wherever its primary requirement we need meet for assurance to beat covid19
